title: In an 'extraordinary' move, Mississippi AG tries to overturn officer's manslaughter conviction
description: Mississippi Attorney General Lynn Fitch has taken the side of convicted former Jackson Police Officer Anthony Fox, who says he didn't kill George Robinson.

title: Twitter is limiting number of daily direct messages for unverified users
description: Twitter announced that it is limiting the number of daily direct messages unverified users can send in an effort it says to reduce spam.

title: Oklahoma mother and her 3 children, including 10-month-old, killed in murder-suicide during supervised visitation
description: An Oklahoma mother is accused of killing her three young children, ages 11, 6, and 10 months old, and then herself during a supervised visitation at her home following an hours-long standoff with police.

title: Mega Millions jackpot grows to $820 million with a possible cash payout of $422 million
description: Mega Millions has upped the ante by another $100 million.

title: Many mobile home park residents in Colorado are afraid to drink the water
description: PALMER LAKE, Colo. — Every day, retired Army veteran Donald Simmons must make a decision: pay $5 to shower at the nearest truck stop or risk taking a shower at home in contaminated water.

title: Online product reviews are becoming a battlefield for modern AI
description: On the battlefield of online reviews, it’s AI vs. AI.

title: Drinking borax is the latest TikTok trend medical authorities working feverishly to debunk
description: People on TikTok have falsely suggested that adding borax to their drinking water or bath could reduce inflammation and ease joint pain.

title: CDC prepares for possible RSV, Covid and flu winter ‘tripledemic’
description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is warning of a potential surge in respiratory syncytial virus, flu and Covid in what could be a "tripledemic."

title: What it’s like for doctors in Wisconsin to follow an 1849 abortion law in 2023
description: After Roe v. Wade was overturned, a 1849 law came back into effect in Wisconsin criminalizing abortion. Two OB-GYNs and a certified midwife reflect on how its impacted how they practice medicine.

title: Jamie Foxx says he 'went to hell and back' as he speaks about medical emergency for first time
description: Jamie Foxx said he “went to hell and back” but was “coming back,” in his first statement since he was hospitalized with an unspecified medical emergency in April.

title: Democrats scramble to reach voters after Florida cancels mail-in ballot requests
description: Florida Democrats are organizing to chase down people who vote by mail after election officials in the state cancelled all standing mail ballot requests.

title: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp contacted by special counsel in 2020 election probe
description: Kemp’s office previously confirmed that Trump tried to pressure the governor to order a special legislative session to overturn Biden’s victory in the state.

title: 2-time defending champions Team USA to face off against World Cup newcomer Vietnam
description: 2-time defending champions Team USA to face off against World Cup newcomer Vietnam
